name: selenium-session-client
description: Selenium session client, selenium webdriver (for selenium 4), read the cookies information from the session server and apply it to the selenium session.
author: blinq.io

scripts.pack: mkdir build && mkdir build/bin && cp ./src/selenium-session-client.js ./build/bin/selenium-session-client.js && cp ./package.json ./build/package.json && cp ./README.md ./build/README.md
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run pack
